name: No Mercy (Zoofy Studios)
description:
A 2D multiplayer shooter with many maps, abilites, guns and much more!

Features: 

  • Custom Rooms.
  • Up-to 8 players online multiplayer.
  • Bots.
  • Thrilling Gameplay.

*Note: The floating jumpads in the screenshots automaticaly falls down when you load in.*
